explanation: Angular momentum is conserved, so <katex>$L_p = L_a$</katex>.
Perihelion is the closest point, so <katex>$r_p < r_a$</katex>.
Since <katex>$L = mvr$</katex>, and <katex>$r_p < r_a$</katex>, then <katex>$v_p > v_a$</katex> to keep L constant.
